trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control is being moved within its own zone, or to another zone.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> é gerado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> ou outro controle de servidor está sendo movido dentro de sua própria zona, ou em outra zona.

trans-unit.source: This can occur both when a user drags a control, and when there is a programmatic move.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode ocorrer quando um usuário arrasta um controle, e quando há uma movimentação através de programação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A> method, and it provides an opportunity to cancel the moving process before it is complete or to track the user action.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> é gerado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A> método e fornece uma oportunidade de cancelar o processo de movimentação antes de ser concluída ou rastrear a ação do usuário.

trans-unit.source: If the move is completed and the control placed in a new position, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event.
trans-unit.target: Se a mudança é concluída e o controle colocado em uma nova posição, esse evento é seguido de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs> class contains information about the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs> classe contém informações sobre o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> evento.

trans-unit.source: It provides access to the Web Parts control that is being moved and the zone it is being moved to.
trans-unit.target: Ele fornece acesso para o controle de Web Parts que está sendo movido e a zona para que serão movidos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control being moved.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> ou outro controle de servidor que está sendo movido.

trans-unit.source: The target <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> to which <c>webPart</c> is being moved.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> de destino para a qual a <c>webPart</c> está sendo movida.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the index of <c>webPart</c> relative to other controls within <c>zone</c>.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que indica o índice da <c>webPart</c> em relação a outros controles na <c>zona</c>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Web Parts zone to which the Web Parts control is being moved.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a zona de Web Parts para a qual o controle de Web Parts está sendo movido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> to which the Web Parts control is being moved.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> para que o controle de Web Parts está sendo movido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index position of a Web Parts control within its zone.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a posição no índice de um controle de Web Parts dentro de sua zona.

trans-unit.source: The numerical order of a control within its zone.
trans-unit.target: A ordem numérica de um controle dentro da zona.

trans-unit.source: The first control in a zone has an index value of zero.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro controle em uma zona tem um valor de índice de zero.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> property indicates the numerical order (or ordinal position) within the zone for the Web Parts control being moved in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> propriedade indica a ordem numérica (ou a posição ordinal) dentro da zona para o controle de Web Parts que está sendo movido <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses this property to track and manage its collection of Web Parts controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controle usa essa propriedade para controlar e gerenciar a sua coleção de controles de Web Parts em uma página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> property for a control might not equal the index value for the same control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs.ZoneIndex%2A> propriedade para um controle não é igual ao valor de índice para o mesmo controle dentro de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> coleção.
